STBLKeyStringList.Text: (From Washing Laundry in the Wash Tub)
{0.SimFirstName}'s dressed so fresh and so clean!
Bleh, this laundry didn't dry thoroughly.
{0.SimFirstName}'s so dizzy, {M0.his}{F0.her} head is spinning... like a whirlpool, it never ends.
The household's laundry load dried sufficiently... Sometimes it's the little things in life that mean the most.
{0.SimFirstName}'s clothing is disgusting. It's well passed time to do a load of laundry. Don't walk... RUN to the nearest Washing Machine.
Mmm... {0.SimFirstName}'s clothing smells like a flowery meadow thanks to that laundry additive.
{0.SimFirstName}'s clothing is pretty dirty. Stop slacking and clean some laundry.
The clothes from this load of laundry turned out exceptionally clean. Nice!
Oh gross, who slipped the rotting food into the laundry load? {0.SimFirstName}'s clothing smells truly foul.
Did someone forget to dry the laundry after it was washed? {0.SimFirstName}'s clothing is absolutely drenched.
{0.SimFirstName}'s outfit isn't exactly fresh from the washer, but nobody will call {M0.him}{F0.her} out for wearing it either. Set aside time to do laundry in the next few days though...
Wearing clothing that was recently dried is like a big warm hug that goes on and on!
Fresh from Crockery Kitchen comes a "reclaimed" lumber door. Artificially aged and stressed, it's the perfect addition to your home, without the risk of termites!

Sometimes you want a hint of the outdoors, without all the nuisance of bright sunlight streaming in. Crockery Kitchen has just what you need! For a modest fee, this optional curtain upgrade on their popular "reclaimed" lumber line lets you enjoy the best of both worlds.

Approximately 15 million Model T clotheslines were produced, and were so prolific that they dotted the backyard of every home in suburbia. Time marched on, and while most Sims rely on the modern convenience of a dryer, the old Model T remains as reliable as ever for your laundry drying needs.\n\n*Owning this object will cause your Sims' clothes to become dirty over time. Wet laundry can be hung on the Clothesline to be dried.
A stack of clothes, folded after being washed and dried.

This dryer is hot, hot, HOT! A controlled fire fueled by natural gas quickly raises the temperature, while the drum rapidly spins to ensure your clothes never stay in one place long enough to get singed. In the unfortunate event that you get burnt, your purchase legally equates to implicit consent to our liability waiver... After all, regular maintenance is the responsibility of the owner!\n\n*Owning this object will cause your Sims' clothes to become dirty over time. Wet laundry can be dried inside the Dryer.

A trail of clothing leading to the bedroom is so cliché. Don't act like a slob; place your clothing in this hamper from Wicker Whims.\n\n*Owning this object will cause your Sims' clothes to become dirty over time. When your Sim changes outfits, discarded clothing will automatically be placed in the nearest hamper that has available space.

With the Feelin' Fabric Hamper, you'll feel compelled to stop and run your hand across the exterior to appreciate the sumptuous feel of this fine fabric. Double canvas layers make a valiant effort to block any unpleasant odors wafting off your soiled clothing.\n\n*Owning this object will cause your Sims' clothes to become dirty over time. When your Sim changes outfits, discarded clothing will automatically be placed in the nearest hamper that has available space.

New from LaundryMaid, it's our most reliable hamper yet! The soft plastic frame offers superior durability, while the chic open hole design allows air to freely circulate.\n\n*Owning this object will cause your Sims' clothes to become dirty over time. When your Sim changes outfits, discarded clothing will automatically be placed in the nearest hamper that has available space.

Guilt free washing is just a click away with the Green Clean Washing Machine. An on-board microchip analyzes your laundry load and automatically adjusts the machine's settings to select the most efficient wash cycle possible. Save time. Save money. Save the planet! Go Green Clean!\n\n*Owning this object will cause your Sims' clothes to become dirty over time. Dirty laundry can be collected from a Hamper, or from clothes piles on the floor, and cleaned inside the Washing Machine.

Rub-a-dub-dub,
Foul clothes in this tub,
What are you waiting for?
On hand and knee,
You'll scrub this tee,
Until you complete this chore!

*Owning this object will cause your Sims' clothes to become dirty over time. Dirty laundry can be collected from a Hamper, or from clothes piles on the floor, and cleaned in the Wash Tub.

This light bulb is 100% eco-friendly. You ask how this can be possible, considering light bulbs are quite old-fashioned and usually less healthy for the environment? Well, we at MorcuCorp spend all the Simoleons we earn by selling this light bulb in exploration of green energy. Big MorcuCorp promise! We won't lie to you!
In a worry that the "Wicker Whims" moniker was limiting the company's product lineup to wicker furniture, management decided to blaze new trails in the candle industry!

Come on down to Barry Potter's Plant Emporium! Today we've got a special deal on indoor shrubbery... and while supplies last, they're available in authentic aged barrels from the Bacciform Firkin Compound. When you reach the register, be sure to say the magic phrase that pays: "Hocus Ficus!"
Succulents so tender, juicy, and tasty... it'd be a shame to keep them around purely as decor.

They say that the right fragrance can trigger endorphins that result in feeling flirtatious. This potpourri arrangement from Wicker Whims provides a custom blend of floral and pine, guaranteed to get the special Sim in your life in the mood.

The rings and circles on this mat are actually markers of the ancient Simolonean calendar. The date they point to is August 16th, 2032. What grim future did our ancestors predict? What calamity awaits us? Only time will tell...
This rug's unique pattern is derived from a nautical knot that was pioneered by the fishermen of Brindleton Bay.
It's no bear skin rug... but if you absolutely need a place to roll around for a romantic romp, you could do worse than this rug from Wicker Whims.
Southwestern stylings and plant patterns? It's madness to try and understand the various variants this rug offers, but hopefully you'll discover one to be the perfect fit in your own abode.
In today's world of plain Jane rugs, you want to add something to your room to give it that extra oomph. Introducing the Fringe Benefits Rug; bringing fringe back into style one home at a time.
Many companies make utility mats, but only one company has the complete confidence to brand themselves after this important accessory. Buy the Utilitarian Utility Mat; every home needs one!

Do you need a rug? How about three? You're in luck! Here at Bigby's Rug Emporium Outlet Store we take rugs with "quirks", and stitch them together to hide the manufacturing defects. One company's trash is YOUR bargain! Save now!

This carefully arranged selection of fruits, flowers, and branches really puts the "still" in "still life". As in... this is still the same scene that you painted yesterday, and it'll still be unchanged tomorrow.
Three laundry baskets should be more than enough for any household.
Panier à Trois by Wicker Whims
Need quick storage for your laundry supplies? No worries, they're a mere drop in the bucket for the ample space provided by this galvanized bucket from the trusted household name of LaundryMaid!
Say the magic word, "ABRACADABRA!" and your laundry will be as soft as a bear cub's fur. That's the Dabra Detergent guarantee!

Old fashioned cleaning devices such as brooms and dustpans have been phased out of Sim society. Nowadays, mops are the only tool you need for messes big and small. Hang these on your wall to reminisce about simpler times.

While these plastic herbs look as fresh as ever, a number of lawsuits and increasingly expensive settlements have caused the warning label on this decorative herb rack to undergo some changes over the years.
Ah the ironing board... a vestige of a time gone by. Now that Sims have discovered the technique of dipping their clothes in formaldehyde, there's simply no need to iron one's laundry anymore.

If you ever find yourself in a pinch with dirty laundry, you'll be glad you had the foresight to purchase this emergency laundry kit. A wash board, drying rack, and ironing board provide everything you need to make yourself presentable. Best of all, it folds up and mounts on the wall for easy storage. Can you really put a price on peace of mind? Buy today!

A towel is the most important item a Sim can carry, so don't limit yourself to just one. With this particular towel rack, you'll have redundancy upon redundancy to allow you to make liberal use of your towels to your heart's content.

From Appaloosa Plains to Twinbrook, Sims have been practicing zydeco music for generations. This musical skill was once held in high regard alongside instruments such as the piano, violin, and guitar, but it unfortunately fell out of vogue in recent times. Perhaps future generations will rediscover this lost art, but for now we pay tribute by hanging these old instruments on our walls.

MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM NO DROP
Slot: WALL
Skill: GARDENING
Effect: Nature's Blight
Focus Effect: Silence of the Snake
Cotton R: +0 G: +0 B: +10 A: +10
Wicker R: +0 G: +0 B: +80 A: +60
Flowers R: +0 G: +10 B: +30 A: +80
Size: 1x1x1
Occult: DRU
Race: SIM

Nature's Blight
Effect: Diffuses mystic protection, allowing spells to do more damage.

Silence of the Snake
Effect: Causes Sims to be less hateful of any heal or damage spell that is cast.
This farmhouse furniture will make any space a little cozier. With plenty of shelving for knick-knacks and doodads, it's the perfect piece to personalize and add personality to any home!
Don't muck up your clean home! Place the Muck Down Cabinet in your mudroom to provide an organized spot to hang up your coat or slip off your shoes.
Most shelving is just so... utilitarian. How droll. Spice up your shelf life with these decorative baskets from Wicker Whims.

LaundryMaid Essentials comes with everything the home needs for an efficient laundry room configuration.

Cleaning pads? Check. 
Hand towels? Check. 
Hangers? Check. 
Storage baskets? Check.
Adorable plant? Check.

Buy one and you're done!

Step up to LaundryMaid Deluxe Shelving when you're ready to take your laundry to the next level. Three separate compartments provide ample room for storage, and a doublewide clothing rack lets you get a head start on hanging and folding.
This one of a kind antique sink developed a unique patina after decades of use in the back bayous of Twinbrook.

Sick of spending top dollar for a simple sink? This one simple life hack will save your hard-earned money! It's easy... simply purchase a 2x4, cut it into three even sections, and then cut a hole in the middle for the sink's basin. You're done!
Are you dining out or eating in? Either way, this affordable dining chair from Wicker Whims is the safe bet for your bottom dollar.

Feeling lonely? Don't have that special someone to snuggle up to? Don't worry; grab a big bowl of ice cream, plop down in the Wicker Whims Living Chair, and watch Simder for the 9th time. You'll be feeling better real soon.
Whicker Whims is putting the love back into loveseats. Cuddle up with your favorite companion on this seat built for two.
Designed for the ultimate in comfort, the thick padding on The Bottoman ensures you'll always have a cushy surface to sink into.

There's only one word that describes the thought process that goes into thinking outside the rectangle: "courage." Introducing the latest innovation that's sweeping through coffee houses across the land. It's a coffee table... squared.
Gather 'round this large dining table from Crockery Kitchen. With seating for six, every generation in the household has ample room to pull up for a bite to eat.
Not exactly an end table, this little unit just ends up being a bit odd. Still, it's perfect for storing odds and ends in out of the way locations.
Sometimes you just need a practical place to store your linens without dedicating an entire closet to it. For those times when life gives you linens... buy this handy storage unit!
A trusty rag for scrubbing in the Wash Tub.
When you tell your boo about the countryside cottage you'll settle down in to grow old together, she's envisioning a home with these beautiful bay windows.
A Hamper with available space is required to clean this up.
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Clean\n• Dryness: Dry & Warm
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Dirty\n• Dryness: Dry & Warm
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Filthy\n• Dryness: Dry & Warm
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Used\n• Dryness: Dry & Warm
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Pristine\n• Dryness: Dry & Warm
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Dirty\n• Dryness: Soaked
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Clean\n• Dryness: Dry
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Clean\n• Dryness: Soaked
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Filthy\n• Dryness: Soaked
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Dirty\n• Dryness: Damp
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Pristine\n• Dryness: Soaked
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Used\n• Dryness: Soaked
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Pristine\n• Dryness: Dry
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Dirty\n• Dryness: Dry
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Filthy\n• Dryness: Dry
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Filthy\n• Dryness: Damp
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Used\n• Dryness: Damp
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Pristine\n• Dryness: Damp
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Clean\n• Dryness: Damp
{0.SimFirstName} has no laundry additives available to add.
Children are too short to interact with this.
There are no wet clothes that need drying.
This clothesline is already in use.
Upgrade complete!\n\n{0.SimFirstName} has finished installing the Clothesline upgrade.
Clothesline will never break or catch on fire.\n
A full lint tray is a fire hazard.
Upgrade complete!\n\n{0.SimFirstName} has finished installing the Clothes Dryer upgrade.
Using the Dryer will not create lint. This helps laundry dry faster, and prevents the chance of starting a fire.\n
The Dryer will not break down over time.\n
Decreases the noise when the Dryer is turned on.\n
The Dryer will take less time to dry laundry.\n
Can't upgrade while laundry is inside.
Upgrade complete!\n\n{0.SimFirstName} has finished installing the Washing Machine upgrade.
Unlocks a laundry additive tray that can be used to add pleasant or foul scents to loads of laundry.\n
The Washing Machine will not break down over time.\n
Decreases the noise when the Washing Machine is turned on.\n
The presoak cycle will take slightly longer, but increases the chance that the Washing Machine will make your clothing pristine.\n
The Washing Machine will take less time to clean laundry.\n
You need the strength of an older Sim to properly scrub clothing.

For the city living, latte sipping, avocado toast munching, environmentally conscious millennial comes this particularly helpful stacked washer / dryer combo unit from Urbanite Appliances. Sure, you could purchase each machine individually and stack them yourself, but who has the time when you've got a planet to save (and a protest to attend). Not only will this stacked unit save space in your microapartment, you'll be pleased to know that it's a sustainable water resource; the moisture literally evaporates in the dryer and drains back into the washer for your next load. While you're out there busy being a leader of tomorrow, you can rest assured your laundry is in good hands here.\n\n*Owning these objects will cause your Sims' clothes to become dirty over time. Dirty laundry can be collected from a Hamper, or from clothes piles on the floor, and cleaned inside the Washing Machine. Wet laundry can be dried inside the Dryer.
Urbanite Appliances Stacked Washer / Dryer Unit
Click on a Dryer and select an Upgrade to apply.
Click on a Washing Machine and select an Upgrade to apply.
Purchase a Dryer for laundry from Build Mode.
Purchase a Washing Machine from Build Mode.
Purchase a Wash Tub from Build Mode.
Click on wet laundry that's on the ground or in a Washing Machine and select Hang on Clothesline.
Select Pick Up Clothing Piles on the Hamper to clean up any clothes left laying around on the floor.
Click on a Clothing Pile on the floor and select Take to Hamper.
Click on a washing machine when finished, select Unload & Move Laundry To, and then Add to Dryer. You can also click on a wet pile of laundry, select Do Laundry, and then Add to Dryer.
Click on a pile of clothing on the ground and select Take to Hamper.
Wash Laundry in the Washing Machine
Click on a pile of dirty laundry on the floor or click on a hamper, select Do Laundry, and then select Wash Laundry.
Wash Laundry in a Wash Tub
Click on dirty laundry and select Wash in Wash Tub.
This load of laundry is...\n• Cleanliness: Used\n• Dryness: Dry
